title: Comments - LWiAI Podcast #122 - AI for Word and Excel, leaked Google memo, ImageBind, LLAva, robot soccer, Midjourney 5.1
content: Microsoft 365’s AI-powered Copilot, Google memo says "We Have No Moat, And Neither Does OpenAI", Meta open-sources multisensory AI model that combines six types of data, and more! Robo here, thank you guys so much for this week’s episode. I appreciate your input on an AI career path. I am actually in computer science classes and clubs already and believe I am already pretty well on pace to work with (and even create) these generative models as a career. Even if AI takes all our jobs. 😅
